abstract: State of New Jersey gives former New York Giants and Jets receiver Plaxico Burress five years to pay $56,000 in back taxes and restitution, or face prison sentence.
lead_paragraph: The former Giants and Jets star Plaxico Burress has five years to repay New Jersey $56,000 in back taxes and restitution.

headline.print_headline: Burress to Pay or Face Prison
headline.main: Burress to Pay or Face Prison

snippet: The former Giants and Jets star Plaxico Burress has five years to repay New Jersey $56,000 in back taxes and restitution....
